sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: A side of an equilateral triangle measures 7 centimeters. What is the perimeter of the triangle in centimeters?
message_2:
An equilateral triangle has three sides of equal length. Since one side measures 7 centimeters, the other two sides also measure 7 centimeters each. To find the perimeter, add the lengths of all three sides:

Perimeter = 7 cm + 7 cm + 7 cm = 21 cm

The perimeter of the equilateral triangle is 21 centimeters.
